sense.def:
A resolution
je uradna odločitev, ki jo udeleženci sestanka sprejmejo z glasovanjem.

seg.quote: Congress passed a resolution accepting his services.

sense.def:
To make a resolution to do something
pomeni skleniti, da se bomo zelo potrudili, da tisto izpeljemo.

seg.quote: I'm always making resolutions, like giving up smoking.

sense.def:
Resolution
je trden sklep, da bomo nekaj naredili ali da nečesa ne bomo naredili.

seg.quote: A note of resolution entered his voice.

sense.def:
The resolution of a problem or difficulty
je odprava težave ali zapleta;

seg.quote: I longed for the resolution of the agonizing dilemma.
